title: Solar PV capacity - new installations worldwide by country 2018
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Percentage of newly installed capacity in each Country on the y axis.
The Percentage of newly installed capacity is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Netherlands.
The highest Country China has 44.0 more Percentage of newly installed capacity than the lowest Country Netherlands.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Percentage of newly installed capacity in each Country on the y axis.
The Percentage of newly installed capacity is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Netherlands.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Percentage of newly installed capacity in each Country on the y axis.
The Percentage of newly installed capacity is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Netherlands.
The highest Country China has 44.0 more Percentage of newly installed capacity than the lowest Country Netherlands.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of newly installed capacity for 10 number of Countrys.
The maximum Percentage of newly installed capacity 45.0 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Netherlands where Country is 1.0.
Second maximum Percentage of newly installed capacity is found at Country US.
The Percentage of newly installed capacity of Country Netherlands is 45.0% smaller than the maximum value at China.
Country China is higher than any other Countrys with value 45.0, followed by US, and US. Down to Country Netherlands with the lowest value 1.0.
Country India, and US have the same Percentage of newly installed capacity.
The lowest value 1.0 at Netherlands is almost 5.06 times smaller than the average value 8.9.
The Percentage of newly installed capacity is 89.0 if we add up values of all Countrys.
